summary: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.
cast: The Marx Brothers|Groucho Marx|Harpo Marx|Chico Marx|Zeppo Marx|Margaret Dumont|Raquel Torres|Louis Calhern|Edmund Breese|Leonid Kinskey|Charles Middleton|Edgar Kennedy|Wade Boteler|Sidney Bracey|E.H. Calvert|Davison Clark|Louise Closser Hale|Joseph Crehan|Carrie Daumery|Mario Dominici|Maude Turner Gordon|Verna Hillie|Edward LeSaint|George MacQuarrie|Edwin Maxwell|Eric Mayne|Edmund Mortimer|Dennis O'Keefe|Leo Sulky|Frederick Sullivan|Ben Taggart|Dale Van Sickel|Charles West|Florence Wix|William Worthington
title: Sopa de ganso
